data.name: ILLWILL Demo
data.detailed_description:
Imagine the mix of Doom, Quake, Blood, Serious Sam with some bits of madness, all put into the most advanced game engine today - Unreal Engine 4.
The name of this bloody cocktail is ILLWILL.

KEY FEATURES:


  • Breathtaking locations filled with hundreds of monsters
  • Polished gameplay containing all the best of old school shooters
  • Variety of weapons - from a double barrel shotgun, warm and beloved as grandma's soup, to a soul ripper with gameplay mechanic unseen before
  • Dozens of monsters willing to ruin your life
  • Music that gets into your heart and makes the blood run cold

Warning!
All the bodies you left behind will remain in place till the end of the game. May the God be with you.

data.short_description: Eliminate hordes of monsters in a thrilling first person shooter - ILLWILL.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 [4GB]
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
